procurement_category: Services de Construction et de Services Techniques
short_summary: Electrical signal cables, power cables and fiber cables
description: Electrical signal cables, power cables and fiber cables need to be installed for the YFB test site in Iqaluit. The scope of work includes tracing and locating existing buried electrical signal and power cables, trenching for new cables, terminating power cables, and electrical work. All work must comply with the Nunavut electrical code and local standards. The contract requires completion within ten weeks and is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement. Services de Construction et de Services Techniques

full_summary: ### Electrical Upgrades, YFB Test Site, Iqaluit, Nunavut #### Reference Information * Reference Number: cb-868-25139968 * Amendment Number: 2 * Solicitation Number: 5000075433 #### Tender Details * Publication Date: 2024-06-26 * Tender Closing Date: 2024-07-26T15:00:00 * Amendment Date: 2024-07-26 * Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-07-18 * Expected Contract End Date: 2025-03-31 * Tender Status: Expired #### Goods and Services * UNSPSC Codes: * 25173900 - Electrical components * 26121600 - Electrical cable and accessories * 39120000 - Electrical equipment and components and supplies * 72102200 - Electrical services * 73152108 - Electrical equipment maintenance and repair service * 81101701 - Electrical engineering services * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies #### Requirements The Sikunaji government is seeking a contractor to perform electrical upgrades at the YFB Test Site in Iqaluit, Nunavut. The work involves installing new electrical signal cables, power cables, and fiber cables, as well as trenching and terminating power cables and electrical work in the garage. The contractor must comply with the Nunavut electrical code and all applicable local standards. The work is expected to be completed within 10 weeks. #### Site Information The YFB test site is located in Iqaluit, Nunavut (2003 Akilliq, Iqaluit, NU X0A-0H0) and is used for testing and evaluation of meteorological instruments and equipment. #### Contact Information Interested suppliers should contact: Helena Lee Email: [Helena.Lee@ec.gc.ca](mailto:Helena.Lee@ec.gc.ca) Phone: (778) 617-2275 Address: 401 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, V6C 3R2 #### Documents Tender Notice and Amendment are available on the [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) platform. Please let me know if this rewritten entry meets your requirements, thank you! 8-)
